Mike Robbins

Sitecore Developer Blog

My Sitecore Modules and Contributions

Sitecore 8 Modules

  • Sitecore 8 Wallpaper Manager

    A Sitecore 8 SPEAK application using Entity Service as an foundation. This application allows Sitecore users to upload new wallpapers and manage existing wallpapers.
    Marketplace: Sitecore Wallpaper Manager on Marketplace
    Source: Wallpaper Manager on GitHub

  • Replace Token's Command

    A new command button for the content editor. Once pressed all tokens are expanded within the current item and replace with their calculated value.
    Marketplace: Replace Token Command on Marketplace
    Source: Token Replacement Command on GitHub

  • Sitecore Bulk Workflow Manager

    A Sitecore 8 SPEAK application using Entity Service as an foundation. This application allows developers or advanced users to assign workflow to Items in bulk.
    Marketplace: Bulk Workflow Manager on Marketplace
    Source: SPEAK Bulk Workflows on GitHub

  • Sitecore Bulk Role Permissions Manager

    A Sitecore 8 SPEAK application. This application allows developers or advanced users to assign security permissions to Items in bulk.
    Marketplace: Bulk Role Permissions Manager on Marketplace
    Source: SPEAK Bulk Role Permissions Manager on GitHub

  • Sitecore Data Importer

    A Sitecore 8 SPEAK application. This application allows developers or advanced users to import data from CSV files into Sitecore Items splitting the data into relevant fields.
    Marketplace: Sitecore Data Importer on Marketplace
    Source: Sitecore Data Importer on GitHub

Other Projects

  • Sitecore Advanced Workflow Email Action

    An experiment to replicate the RSS feed workflow view into an email action.
    Blog Post: http://mikerobbins.co.uk/2014/04/14/workflow-rss-feed-custom-email-action/
    Source: Advanced Email Action on GitHub

  • Sitecore Save and Publish Command

    An experiment to create a save and publish button in the content editor.
    Source: Save And Publish Command on GitHub

Sample Projects

  • Entity Service Demo Application

    This demo Entity Service / SPEAK application was built to demonstrate how to build in Entity Service. I built it for a Sitecore User Group talk I did.
    Source: Entity Service Demo on GitHub

Visual Studio Templates

  • Entity Service (SSC) Visual Studio Project Template

    A Visual Studio project template to easily create Entity Service SSC based projects.
    Blog Post: http://mikerobbins.co.uk/2015/02/20/entity-service-visual-studio-project-template/
    Source: Entity Service Template on GitHub

  • Sitecore SPEAK Visual Studio Project Template

    A Visual Studio project template to easily create Sitecore SPEAK based projects.
    Source: SPEAK Templates For Visual Studio on GitHub

My gists

https://gist.github.com/komainu85

Projects with other developers

  • Sitecore Toolbox

    This project is an idea by Jamie Little, to create a collection of standard Sitecore functionality that gets recreated time and time again on projects.
    Source: Sitecore Toolbox on GitHub

  • Sitecore Template Tool Kit

    Jonathan Robbins and myself started this project for the Sitecore Hackathon 2015.
    Source: Template Tool Kit on GitHub
